title: Morning Mimosa
description: Your favorite five hours each day with Trish and Suze aka “The Sizzle.” Cooking, makeovers, Thursday Birdsday, and the very best day: Maximum Mimosa Monday.
altHero: two women (Trish and Suze) host a talk show while drinking mimosas
alt1: Trish and Suze look shocked as Steve Smith guests for a cooking segment
alt2: a woman cowers against a brick wall splattered with tacos
alt3: a sad woman below a sign that reads “Unsalvageable”
alt4: Trish and Suze with Steve’s friend Snot; a chyron says “Three happy days!”
